name: The Heart, She Holler
overview:
The Heart, She Holler is a live action television series produced by PFFR for Adult Swim. The series, described as "Southern Gothic drama" and "an inside-out blend of soap opera and politically incorrect surrealist comedy," is about the long-lost son of the Heartshe dynasty – played by Patton Oswalt – returning to run the town and being locked in conflict with sisters Hurshe and Hambrosia. The show premiered on November 6, 2011, and its 14-episode second season premiered on September 11, 2013.

The title of the series is a play on words, in that the name of the family which controls the town is "Heartshe", and "Holler" is an Appalachian pronunciation of the word "hollow", meaning small valley, essentially making it "The Heartshe Hollow".

episodes.name: And So It Begends
episodes.overview: When Boss Hoss Heartshe dies, who will inherit the town? The answer is a secret you can never know! (Answer: his secret son.)

episodes.name: No, Jojo, No!
episodes.overview: Hambrosia and Hurshe use the greatest weapons of all time to get control of the holler: hand chops, doll-napping and murder.

episodes.name: Holy Meemaw
episodes.overview: Boss Hoss Heartshe decides its high time Hurlan, his head man-boy in charge cracks the nut of the town curse.

episodes.name: Fear is Dog Spelled Bassackwards
episodes.overview: Sometimes low-class people require high-tech solutions. And the Bible.

episodes.name: Death Begins at Conception
episodes.overview: When Hurlan discovers that his calling is to be a doctor, his sister, Hurshe, takes advantage of his crotch generosity.

episodes.name: Dare to Holler
episodes.overview: When a non-meddling non-reporter doesn't stick his nose where it doesn't belong, the holler goes on HIGH ALERT!

episodes.name: Begend the Endginning
episodes.overview: Witch sister'll win the Miss Heartshe crown: Hurshe or Hambrosia? Pageant judge Hurlan will try dying... or die trying!

episodes.name: Proper Dental Care is MURDER
episodes.overview: Hambrosia teaches Doc that death is a gift, but Doc exchanges it for a thinly veiled metaphor concerning the complexities of the abortion debate.

episodes.name: The Blue Lonegoon
episodes.overview: Sometimes you just gotta get away from it all, in order to destroy the entirety of civilization.

episodes.name: The Telltale Butthole
episodes.overview: The mind is a terrible thing. Viva Cerebroheims!

episodes.name: Mu-Mu-Mu-Meat
episodes.overview: When a henchbaby's guilt comes back to haunt the Holler, Hurlan must become a man - all over his gun.

episodes.name: Pequiem for a Recker
episodes.overview: Death plays doorbell ditch in Doc's crotch. Hurshe answers the ding dong.

episodes.name: Emotional Can of Mommyworms
episodes.overview: After many lonely years, Hurlan finally gets to feel the cold touch of a mommy.

episodes.name: The DeArranged Marriage
episodes.overview: Hurlan's tangled heart gets tied up in more twists than a bag of pretzel sticks when he hears the international grunt of love.

episodes.name: Werelan
episodes.overview: The whole of Heartshe gets bitten in the dog by the hot wolf of American sexceptionalism.

episodes.name: Come Unity
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger shows Heartshe, the rock hard way, that humanity is a celestial continuum.

episodes.name: Hambrain Jan
episodes.overview: The only thing more brainless than a dumb guy is a dumb guy with a brain.

episodes.name: Preverse Psychologism
episodes.overview: yrotanalpxe-fles (Hold mirror up to this text, then to your own face. You have just confronted collective despair.)

episodes.name: Gamebored
episodes.overview: Destiny spelled sdrawkcab is Mee Maw.

episodes.name: The Endginning
episodes.overview: Good things only come to those who crawl desperately into living cadavers.

episodes.name: In Meatro
episodes.overview: One billion gods working inside three trillion universes couldn’t possibly create a reality this stupid.

episodes.name: WUWPs
episodes.overview: The history of America is a narrative concerning the triumph of white supremacy.

episodes.name: Klansgender Rights
episodes.overview: Children are born corrupt, but gradually over time they begin to pass away and then rot.

episodes.name: Groaning Amore
episodes.overview: When little ol’ love finally learns to talk, it chooses instead to yowl until its throat fills with brown.

episodes.name: Oralboros
episodes.overview: For once, the tail manages to catch its snake and gobbles it down with a side of bibleberries.

episodes.name: Slaughter Me to Heaven
episodes.overview: The only true fact left in the whole world turns out to be a police sting to catch sexual predators and lock them up behind pearly gates.

episodes.name: Congroined Hearts
episodes.overview: While it is busy having fun, victory is eaten by time flies.
